segments.text: I'm really worried about that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it's definitely tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far upward, his center of gravity must be all wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost picture him toppling over backwards onto the hard floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so close, she could easily be caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a disaster that would be, especially with the wet floor nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would secure it, or at least help him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains completely oblivious, lost in her dish drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such a clear danger unfold unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on getting those cookies, he doesn't seem to perceive the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is teetering on the edge of an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding just watching him reach further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
